etymologies: late 18th century: from Khoikhoi and San, perhaps imitative of the sound made by the animal when alarmed

definitions: a large dark African antelope with a long head, a beard and mane, and a sloping back.

notes.text: Genus Connochaetes, family Bovidae: two species, in particular the abundant brindled gnu or blue wildebeest (C. taurinus)

shortDefinitions: large dark antelope with long head, beard and mane
